publicationstmt.publisher: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-07 13:19:24 -0400.

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is in received order.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: The Estate of Rachel G. Hill donated these objects to Tufts University by giving that materials to the Estate and Gift Planning Office. That office transferred the records to the Digital Collections and Archives; date range is approximate.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection includes family photographs, a family bible, and some photographs and an invitation relating to the 1964 reunion of the Tufts class of 1914.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Rachel Gertrude Hill graduated from Tufts University with a BS in 1947 majoring in biology. She is related to Ralph W. Hill, Tufts University, BSSE Engineering, 1914, Civil Engineering major; and Robert W. Hill, Tufts University, BA Arts & Sciences.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research. This collection may require review before it is available for use. Please contact DCA for further details.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. No documentation is available regarding the intellectual property rights in this collection.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection includes family photographs and a family bible, as well as some photographs and an invitation relating to the 1964 reunion of the Tufts class of 1914.
